sense.gloss: to spring, to bound, to bounce
to be stimulated, to be encouraged, to get lively
to pay handsomely, to splurge, to part eagerly with (money, etc.)
to breathe hard, to pant, to be out of breath
x: 息が弾む・いきがはずむ

sdata.j: ゴムのボールは↑弾力↑↓だんりょく↓↑性↑↓せい↓があるから↑弾↑↓|はず↓む|。
sdata.e: A rubber ball bounces because it is elastic.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑胸↑↓むね↓は↑期待↑↓きたい↓に|はずむ|。
